1.title: Puppy Flipper Sting
1.plot: The Guardians' mission: to help animals where others can't. Founder Rob and investigators Marceline, Bill & Elle hope to unmask a puppy flipper; members Brian & Face look for a dog in a mechanic's hoard; rescuer Dori & vet Moose help animals in need.

2.title: The Angry King
2.plot: The Guardians' mission: to help animals where others can't. Founder Rob and vet Moose investigate a claim of dogfighting; members Brian and Face set out to help an aggressive dog on a chain; rescuer Dori helps a homeless vet and his cats.

3.title: Stakeout
3.plot: The Guardians' mission: to help animals where others can't. Rob and Dori hope to rescue a dog from its chain; Moose and Elle confront a man accused of dog abuse; Brian and Amanda meet a homeless veteran and his two dogs.

4.title: Doggie Drone Deployment
4.plot: The Guardians' mission: to help animals where others can't. Rob & Elle investigate a claim of dogs on a hot roof; Brian & Face help a woman whose neighbor is provoking her dog; Dori & Moose meet a cat hoarder who is more than she seems.

5.title: Feral NightMARE
5.plot: The Guardians' mission: to help animals where others can't. Dori revisits homeless vet George to clean up his campsite, finding a surprise; Marceline & Elle investigate a claim of starving horses; Rob & Bill help cats caught in a heated conflict.

6.title: Bayou Rescue
6.plot: In this season finale, the Guardians of Rescue head to flood-stricken Louisiana to rescue the loved ones left behind - people's animals. In the midst of natural disaster, the Guardians face their biggest rescue challenges yet.

imdb.plot outline: When traditional rescue organizations can't help an animal, the Guardians of Rescue are called. They are a group of former undercover cops, FBI, Navy Seals, Marines, and Private Investigators who make up the most effective but least known animal rescue group in the US.
imdb.title: The Guardians
plot: When traditional rescue organizations can't help an animal, the Guardians of Rescue are called. They are a group of former undercover cops, FBI, Navy Seals, Marines, and Private Investigators who make up the most effective but least known animal rescue group in the US.
